mapper.select: SELECT pm.mmbrNo, m.nickNm FROM play p, playMmbr pm, mmbr m WHERE p.playNo = pm.playNo AND pm.mmbrNo = m.mmbrNo AND p.sttsCd = '1' AND p.playNo = #{playNo} ORDER BY m.nickNm
SELECT m.mmbrNo, m.nickNm FROM play p, mmbr m WHERE p.hostMmbrNo = m.mmbrNo AND p.sttsCd = '1' AND p.playNo = #{playNo}
SELECT pl.log FROM play p, playLog pl WHERE p.playNo = pl.playNo AND p.sttsCd = '1' AND pl.playNo = #{playNo} ORDER BY pl.dateTime DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT g.gameNo, g.gameNm, g.minPlyrCnt, g.maxPlyrCnt FROM game g WHERE 1=1
AND g.gameNm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gameNm},'%')
ORDER BY g.gameNm
